title: Zap! Thinking Science
description:
This is an old educational game, circa 1998. It aims to teach kids about sound, light, and electricity through some kind of rock concert show thing. I certainly enjoyed it, and wanted to share.

The game works fine under Windows XP- I haven't tested it under Vista or later.

1. Mount the ISO in Daemon Tools/Alcohol 120%/MagicDisk or burn it to a CD using ImgBurn

2. Open/Explore the disk and right click on SETUP.EXE. Choose 'properties' and go to the 'compatibility' tab.

3. Change the compatibility settings to "Windows 95" and choose OK. 

4. Install the program by running SETUP.EXE

5. Run the program.

Enjoy!
